find_reachable_unseen_tiles.description: Identifies all unseen tiles on the current map that are adjacent to reachable walkable tiles. If autopress_buttons is true, returns a path to the nearest one.

history.commit_message: Initial version
Refined logic to correctly identify unseen tiles adjacent to reachable walkable tiles. Removed 'unseen' from walkable types to ensure search only passes through confirmed traversable areas.
Fix find_reachable_unseen_tiles to return button strings when autopress_buttons is true.
Initial implementation of find_reachable_unseen_tiles. Fixed collision check to include BOOKSHELF.
Refined collision logic to include PC and WINDOW. Ensured exploration tool accounts for indoor obstacles.
Initial implementation of reachable unseen tiles finder.
Initial implementation with basic collision check and reachability analysis.
Refined to return a path of buttons to the nearest unseen tile when called with autopress_buttons.
Refined collision logic to handle ledges (Down, Left, Right) and one-way walls (FLOOR_UP_WALL, WALL_UP_FLOOR). Removed WATER from default walkable list.
Adding wall and ledge collision logic to find_reachable_unseen_tiles.
Refining collision logic for all wall types and ledges in the exploration tool.
Explicitly add autopress_buttons to schema to ensure it's passed to input_data.
Incorporate directional collision logic (FLOOR_UP_WALL, etc.) and ledge jumping into find_reachable_unseen_tiles.

find_path_v7_robust.description: Finds a path between two coordinates on the current map, accounting for complex collision types (ledges, one-way walls), treating 'unseen' tiles as walkable FLOOR, and supporting surfing/land modes. Returns at most 50 buttons if autopress_buttons is true.

history.commit_message: Initial version
Update FLOOR_UP_WALL collision logic to check both 'from' and 'to' tiles.
Refine FLOOR_UP_WALL collision to block all North/South entry and exit.
Update find_path_v7_robust to handle WATER, WATERFALL, and Objects. Added coordinate-based output option.
Fixing pathfinding logic to include all wall types and ledges and adding button output.
Refining collision logic for all wall types and ledges. Added consistent entry/exit blocking for one-way tiles.
Add support for surfing mode and refined collision logic (directional walls, ledges).
Add surfing state tracking to BFS and limit output to 50 buttons for autopress.
Refine directional collision logic to include both entry and exit checks for one-way tiles.
Treat UP_WALL/DOWN_WALL etc as completely blocking their axis of movement based on confirmed in-game failures.

menu_navigator_v2.description: Executes a sequence of button presses to navigate menus. Returns a JSON array of buttons. Use this to bypass the restriction on mixing directional and action inputs. Automatically handles autopress_buttons.
menu_navigator_v2.python_script:
import json
sequence = input_data.get('sequence', [])
result = []
for i, button in enumerate(sequence):
    result.append(button)
    if i < len(sequence) - 1:
        result.append("sleep 200")
print(json.dumps(result))

history.commit_message: Initial version
